channel.title: Open Source on Econumo
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Econumo

item.title: Installation with Docker-Compose
item.description: Installation # You need to have Docker and Docker Compose installed on your machine to run Econumo. Create a .env file in the root directory of your project (see an example below). Create a docker-compose.yml file in the root directory of your project with the content listed below. Run docker-compose up -d in the root directory of the project. Environment Variables # # Econumo environment variables # Frontend ECONUMO_CONFIG_API_URL=http://localhost:8081 # Backend APP_ENV=prod APP_SECRET=123 # Change this to a random string # Specify the secret and public key paths JWT_SECRET_KEY=%kernel.
